description:
Two centuries have passed since a hero defeated the evil Jaryu and saved the world. In one of the many dungeon cities, http://anidb.net/ch137540 [Raust], a healer scorned and cast out of his party for being too weak, struggles to find his place. Amidst despair, he meets martial artist http://anidb.net/ch137539 [Narsena], who invites him to form a new party together. With a fresh start and renewed motivation, the two begin their journey to greatness.
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
A girl appears before Laust, an incompetent healer who has just been kicked out of his party. Introducing herself as Narsena, she turns to Laust and says, "Would you be willing to form a party with me?"
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cette rencontre n`est pas la première, en réalité
Regarding Their Meeting, Which Was, in Fact, a Reunion
Sono Deai, Jitsu wa Saikai ni Tsuki
その出会い, 実は再会につき

REGULAR.description:
Laust had a very painful youth. Despite his best efforts as an adventurer, he was branded an "ignoramus" and lost confidence in himself. Then when wandering outside the city one day, he met a girl who inspired him to keep trying. But who exactly was she?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cette expulsion est un nouveau départ, en réalité
Regarding the Banishment, Which Was, in Fact, the Start of a New Voyage
Sono Tsuihou, Jitsu wa Arata naru Tabidachi ni Tsuki
その追放, 実は新たなる旅立ちにつき

REGULAR.description:
When Margulus, the leader of Blades of Lightning, finally admits Laust`s talents and realizes how valuable the healer was to the party, he tries to recruit Laust again. However, Laust flatly refuses. The next day, Laust receives some unexpected visitors.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cette soigneuse a un cœur d`or, en réalité
Regarding the Mage, Who Is, in Fact, a Kind Soul
Sono Mahou Tsukai, Jitsu wa Kokoro Yasashiki Hito ni Tsuki
その魔法使い, 実は心優しきひとにつき

REGULAR.description:
With a new swordsman beside him, Margulus stubbornly tries to slay the hydra again. The Blades of Lightning members slowly make progress against the monster, but by the time Laust arrives on the scene, the hydra has undergone a terrifying transformation.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce sauvetage est un adieu, en réalité
Regarding the Rescue, Which Is, in Fact, a Farewell
Sono Kyuuen, Jitsu wa Ketsubetsu no Tame ni Tsuki
その救援, 実は決別のためにつき

REGULAR.description:
Laust starts to suspect that something ominous is happening involving monsters in the labyrinth and in Mardat. He asks Hanzum, the current head of the Guild, to take action. Hanzum refuses and tells Laust that if he is scared he should "get out of town."
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cette ingérence est source d`inquiétude, en réalité
Regarding the Meddling, Which Is, in Fact, a Reason for Concern
Sono Osekkai, Jitsu wa Fuan no Tane ni Tsuki
そのおせっかい, 実は不安の種につき

REGULAR.description:
Laust and his companions enter the labyrinth on their quest to battle the phoenix and earn the bounty from the Guild. They quickly track the phoenix down and engage it, but the instant they start causing damage to the fiery creature, it begins to mutate.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cette quête est le début d`un renouveau, en réalité
Regarding the Quest, Which Is, in Fact, the Start of a Comeback
Sono Quest, Jitsu wa Saiki no Itoguchi ni Tsuki
そのクエスト, 実は再起の糸口につき

REGULAR.description:
Now that they can afford it, Narsena suggests to Laust that it might be more practical to get a house and move in together - an invitation that is also a thinly-veiled expression of Narsena`s love. Unfortunately, Laust`s response is less than enthusiastic.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cette croisée des chemins est une rencontre fatidique, en réalité
Regarding the Crossing of Paths, Which Was, in Fact, a Fateful Encounter
Sono Surechigai, Jitsu wa Meguriai ni Tsuki
そのすれ違い, 実は巡り逢いにつき

REGULAR.description:
Strange things continue to happen in Mardat`s labyrinth. Laust, witnessing a new victim, once again requests for the guild to take action. However, once again, he is rejected by Hanzum. As Laust persists, Hansam asks, "Have you forgotten me completely?"
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Cet homme est un vieil ami, en réalité
Regarding the Man, Who Was, in Fact, an Old Friend
Sono Otoko, Jitsu wa Mukashinajimi ni Tsuki
その男, 実は昔なじみにつき

REGULAR.description:
After a powerful earthquake shakes Mardat, waves of monsters start marching toward the city in a labyrinth uprising. Guild leadership quickly takes action. Suspicious that the Guild was expecting an uprising all along, Laust and friends ready for battle.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Le maître est le disciple, en réalité
Regarding the Master, Who Was, in Fact, the Apprentice
Sono Shishou, Jitsu wa Deshi ni Tsuki
その師匠, 実は弟子につき

REGULAR.description:
Laust, Narsena, and Ralma confront Mist and are told that to end the uprising, Ralma must commit all of her magic to creating a barrier while Mist and Hanzum hunt down the lord of the labyrinth. Ralma agrees but reminds Laust that Mist cannot be trusted.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce magicien est un imposteur, en réalité
Regarding the Magician, Who Was, in Fact, a Two-Faced Liar
Sono Majutsushi, Jitsu wa Kuwasemono ni Tsuki
その魔術師, 実は食わせ者につき

REGULAR.description:
Laust learns that Narsena is in fact the sleeping princess. He and the others decide to follow Mist and Hanzum in an attempt to rescue her. When they finally locate Narsena and her captors deep inside the labyrinth, Mist begins to explain his intentions.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce déchaînement est le début de la destruction, en réalité
Regarding the Uprising, Which Was, in Fact, the Beginning of Destruction
Sono Bousou, Jitsu wa Hakai no Hajimari ni Tsuki
その暴走, 実は破壊のはじまりにつき

REGULAR.description:
With the evil dragon now inhabiting Mist`s body, the second wave of the uprising approaches Mardat. Laust and his companions fight to defend the city, but when they find themselves overwhelmed by the dragon`s powers, Narsena decides to sacrifice herself.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce dénouement est le début d`un nouveau voyage, en réalité
Regarding the Conclusion, Which Was, in Fact, the Start of a New Journey
Sono Ketsumatsu, Jitsu wa Arata na Tabi no Hajimari ni Tsuki
その結末, 実は新たな旅のはじまりにつき
Episode S1
Gendai no Chiyu "Sauna", Jitsu wa Saikyou ni Tsuki!!!
現代の治癒「サウナ」, 実は最強につき!!!
Episode S2
Kyou mo Genki ni Narsena TV: Abema mo Mite Kudaseena!
今日も元気にナルセーナTV ~ABEMAも見てくだセーナ!~

WIKIPEDIA_JP: パーティーから追放されたその治癒師、実は最強につき

titles.title: Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Sono Chiyushi, Jitsu wa Saikyou ni Tsuki
The Healer Who Was Banished From His Party, Is, in Fact, the Strongest
パーティーから追放されたその治癒師, 実は最強につき
被逐出隊伍的治癒師，其實是最強
被队伍驱逐的治愈师，其实是最强的
sonochiyushi
O curandeiro que foi banido do seu grupo é na verdade, o mais forte!
The Healer
